creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two pieces buttoned together with cord and coin buttons; a) blue panel with cross stitch on blue border; top 5" geometric embroidery in brown/white/gold; brown fringe with black and white beads; b) 9" brown fringe with black and white beads; connecting cord has intermediate fringe
title: Under Apron
